# coder state


Manually manage Terraform state to fix broken workspaces

## Usage
```console
coder state [flags]
```

## Subcommands
| Name |   Purpose |
| ---- |   ----- |
| <code>pull</code> | Pull a Terraform state file from a workspace. |
| <code>push</code> | Push a Terraform state file to a workspace. |
